bilingual.target: 过度暴露在阳光下伤害你的皮肤。

bilingual.source: The exposure to cold weather made him sick.
bilingual.target: 暴露在寒冷的天气中使他生病了。

bilingual.source: The exposure of the scandal ruined his career.
bilingual.target: 这次丑闻的暴露毁了他的事业。

bilingual.source: Sun exposure on the skin can cause sunburn.
bilingual.target: 太阳暴露在皮肤上可能会导致晒伤。

bilingual.source: Exposure to radioactivity can be harmful to health.
bilingual.target: 暴露在放射性下对健康有害。

bilingual.source: The safety limit for exposure is set at 1 mCi.
bilingual.target: 暴露的安全限值设定为1毫居里。

bilingual.source: The exposure to sunlight can improve your mood.
bilingual.target: 暴露在阳光下可以改善你的心情。

bilingual.source: Radon exposure can increase the risk of lung cancer.
bilingual.target: 暴露在氡中会增加患肺癌的风险。

bilingual.source: Exposure to vinyl chloride can be harmful to health.
bilingual.target: 暴露在氯乙烯中可能对健康有害。

bilingual.source: Prolonged exposure to noise can cause tinnitus.
bilingual.target: 长时间暴露在噪音中可能会导致耳鸣。

list.abstract: Alien Skin Exposure 能为数码照片提供胶片的曝光，还包括模仿胶片的颗粒感，并且可以控制胶片颗粒的分布，是模拟胶片效果的最佳数码摄影工具。

yingyinNormal.en: You have risked the exposure of our world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们差一点就让我们的世界被公诸于世。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: There's no signs of trauma or exposure. The child appears healthy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没发现有伤口或感染迹象，孩子看起来很健康。

yingyinNormal.en: What's your exposure? $3 billion? Please, don't tell me it's more than four.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风险敞口是多少？三十亿吗？拜托，别跟我说超过四十亿了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, I read all about your accident. That much gamma exposure should've killed you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，我对你的遭遇一清二楚，那么强的伽马射线，足以杀死你。

yingyinNormal.en: Exposure like that could cause any number of health problems: nausea, migraine headaches, even cancer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种辐射可能引发多种健康问题：恶心，偏头痛，甚至癌症。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. A little good deed for PBS, plus some TV exposure, now that's the kind of math Joey likes to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮公共电视台做好事，又能增加曝光率，我乔伊最爱做这种事了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I know, but plenty of things are addictive after a single exposure. I mean, crack cocaine, nicotine, Pringles. You know once one pops one just can't stop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我知道，但很多事物只要试一次就会上瘾，比如说可卡因，尼古丁，品客薯片，根本停不下来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Now the researchers are probing the specific effects of teaching style, teaching assistants' eating habits and students' video <highlight>exposure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，研究人员正在探索教学风格、助教的饮食习惯和学生视频曝光的具体影响。

examination_example.sentence: However, Cortina said, early <highlight>exposure</highlight> is beneficial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，Cortina说，早期接触是有益的。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have found that <highlight>exposure</highlight> to this hormone puts us in a trusting mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们发现，接触这种激素会让我们产生信任的情绪。

examination_example.sentence: Cortina holds that early <highlight>exposure</highlight> to computer science makes it easier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科尔蒂纳认为，早期接触计算机科学会使事情变得更容易。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Exposure</highlight> times were much quicker by the 1880s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到19世纪80年代，曝光时间要快得多。

examination_example.sentence: They show effects of different <highlight>exposure</highlight> times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们显示了不同曝光时间的影响。

examination_example.sentence: In the early days of photography, <highlight>exposure</highlight> times were notoriously long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在摄影的早期，曝光时间是出了名的长。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 朝向; 方向; 景色

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 使暴露；使显露；暴露；揭露；揭发；露阴；使无遮蔽；使（胶卷）曝光；当众暴露自己的性器官；使…处于无保护和易受伤害的状态

sense_info_list.en: the state of being exposed to contact with something

examination_example.sentence: One of the most researched laws of social psychology is something called the "mere <highlight>exposure</highlight> effect".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会心理学研究最多的规律之一是所谓的“简单暴露效应”。

examination_example.sentence: Most Grand Tourists expected to return home with an understanding of art and architecture formed by <highlight>exposure</highlight> to great masterpieces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大陆游学旅行者们都期望通过接触伟大的杰作，带着对艺术和建筑的理解回家。

sense_info_list.en: the fact of an event or information being often discussed in newspapers

examination_example.sentence: In the year 2004, at the height of over-<highlight>exposure</highlight> of the Burberry check, the brand's turnover was £715.5 million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，在Burberry支票过度曝光的高峰期，该品牌的营业额为7.155亿英镑。

examination_example.sentence: Advertisements featuring professional athletes and their endorsed products tend to get impressive <highlight>exposure</highlight> on TV, radio, in print and online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以职业运动员及其代言产品为特色的广告往往会在电视、广播、印刷品和网络上获得令人印象深刻的曝光。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is possible, however, to view the colors in a moonbow using long <highlight>exposure</highlight> (长时间曝光) photography.
